Balloon-powered submarine: Using a balloon to generate lift and propel a submarine underwater.
Balloon-powered car: Using a balloon to generate lift and propel a car on land.
Balloon-powered boat: Using a balloon to generate lift and propel a boat on water.
Balloon-powered helicopter: Using a balloon to generate lift and propel a helicopter in the air.
Balloon-powered parachute: Using a balloon to generate lift and provide a parachute for a person.
